content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Describe one way in which the passage reflects social changes during the early modern period. b) Describe one way in which economic changes affected the gender roles described in the passage. c) Explain one way in which Marinella’s point of view may have influenced her description of other countries.

topic.text: 3.3: Continuities and Changes to Economic Practice and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
